variants.Description in input context: This variant causes a frameshift mutation, resulting in the premature termination of the protein.

Material used.Description: DNA was extracted from the blood sample.

Readout description.Result Description: The variant NM_000314.6:c.124delC (p.A42fs*4) was detected in the patient's genomic DNA.

Biological replicates.Description: Two biological replicates were performed on different days, and the results were consistent.

Technical replicates.Description: Each sample was run in duplicate.

Basic positive control.Description: A healthy control's genomic DNA was used as a positive control.

Basic negative control.Description: Negative control (no template) was included in each reaction.

Threshold for normal readout.Threshold for normal readout: The absence of the variant in a healthy control.

Threshold for abnormal readout.Threshold for abnormal readout: The presence of the variant in the patient's genomic DNA.
